external_games.name: Weather Lord: Legendary Hero Collector's Edition
Weather Lord: Legendary Hero Collector's Edition
Weather Lord: Legendary Hero Collector's Edition

name: Weather Lord: Legendary Hero - Collector's Edition
summary:
Call upon the gods of Olympus to help you rescue your beloved before all hope is gone! Unfolding with the scope of an epic fantasy adventure, Weather Lord: Legendary Hero - Collector's Edition will capture your imagination even as it draws you into hours of compelling gameplay!

This Collector's Edition includes;
- A huge bonus chapter
- A step-by-step walkthrough of the game
- Downloadable wallpapers
- Music
- Character bios
- An exclusive mini-game
- Dozens of challenging levels!
